com.github.rholder.esthree.progress

Interface MutableProgressListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.amazonaws.event.ProgressListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PrintingProgressListener

    public interface MutableProgressListener
extends com.amazonaws.event.ProgressListener
    A ProgressListener implementation that allows customization of the completed progress.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.amazonaws.event.ProgressListener

      • withMultiplier

        MutableProgressListener withMultiplier(java.lang.Double multiplier)
        The number to multiply the current transferred percentage by to determine how far along the download is. This is useful when multiple chunks are being fetched and each incoming chunk contributes only a percentage of the total number of bytes expected to be transferred.
        Parameters:
        multiplier - multiply the completed percentage by this
        Returns:
        this MutableProgressListener
